title: Wedding gifts
text:
This gift list is made up of itens that we need or desire. Each item represents a value that will be converted into cash.
Remember that the gift is completely optional! What we most want is the presence of people that are dear to us, and who root for our happiness!







Mortar and Pestle  $32







Baking Pan Set  $35







Cast Iron Cookware Set  $55












Mattress Protector - Single Size (for the guest room mattress!)  $53







Mattress Protector - Queen Size  $76







Queen Size Sheet Set - Autumn Percale  $84







Gray Queen Size Blanket - A blanket for the new bed, in the groom‚Äôs favorite color!  $86







Queen Size Sheet Set - Soft Touch Rhapsody Percale  $150







Queen Size Duvet Cover + Plain Duvet Set - A duvet with a cover, for the new bed!  $190












‚ÄúIntroduction to Carpentry for Women‚Äù Course at Oficina Lab: Bia wants to one day make beautiful furniture like Cid does!  $124












Dinner at Jaquin‚Äôs Restaurant - You can invite yourself to dinner with us!  $133







Cooking Course - Julio wants to prepare for MasterChef.  $619












Accommodation in Maragogi - Let‚Äôs stay at an all-inclusive resort, so Bea can go to the beach whenever she wants, and Julio will have 24/7 food!  $1,333







Plain Tickets to Maragogi - Let‚Äôs go to Maragogi, where crystal-clear waters and paradise beaches await us.  $571







Boat Ride - Let‚Äôs sail through crystal-clear waters on a relaxing and romantic boat ride.  $133







Dune Tour - Let‚Äôs take a walk through the dunes, followed by a sunset picnic.  $114







Couples Massage - Let‚Äôs relax and enjoy a couples massage in a luxurious spa. We deserve this treat!  $95







Cooking Class - Let‚Äôs venture into the kitchen together in a cooking class to learn how to prepare delicious dishes. Who knows, maybe we‚Äôll become chefs?  $67







Buggy Ride in Maragogi - Let‚Äôs explore nature on a buggy ride, full of beautiful landscapes and fresh air. It will be an unforgettable adventure!  $67







Candlelit Dinner - Let‚Äôs enjoy a romantic candlelit dinner at a fancy restaurant. Don‚Äôt worry, we won‚Äôt overdo it with the candles!  $57







Dance Class - Julio needs to learn some dance moves in a fun class. Who knows, he might dazzle on the dance floor at the next party?  $48







Karaoke Night - Let‚Äôs sing our hearts out on a karaoke night, showcasing our hidden talents. It will be a night to remember (or forget)!  $38












Blender  $37







Electric Fondue Pan  $46







Mixer - now that we have an oven, we can bake cakes!  $91







Vacuum Cleaner  $120







Robot Vacuum Cleaner  $628












Queen Size Mattress - To have a bed that fits the groom!  $400







Dining Table - it‚Äôs where we‚Äôll eat when you come visit us!  $476







Queen Size Bed Frame - To have a bed that fits the bride and groom!  $762







If you want to gift us a iten, or leave the choice for us, you can transfer the money with Paypal to: beatriz.milz@hotmail.com‚Äù.

title: Tips
text:
We recommend smart casual attire.
Dear guests, avoid using the terracotta and emerald green colors as they will be the color of the bridesmaids‚Äô and mothers‚Äô dresses.
And remember: The white color is just for the bride!



For people who live outside the Metropolitan Region of S√£o Paulo, we have listed some hotels in the city of S√£o Bernardo do Campo:
